Posts.Content: Seems like cialis is not working much anymore. I purchase it from northwest pharmacy, and it used to work better than it does now. I have usually taken one 20 mg early evening and another before bedtime, hoping ill be hard in the morning, but getting less and less results. I do have a few drinks before bedtime. I also take cymbalta daily for depression, and a sleep aid since I cannot fall asleep on my own. any advice from post brachytherapy patients? (I was told that having brachytherapy was less less invasive and less chance of ED. (All my yearly exams have shown a constant reduction of PSA, from 1.9 to .5 or less) Im about ready to see my doctor about injection drugs. any advice would be appreciated! Thanks bob
Posts.Title: 4 years post brachytheraphy and cialis is hit or miss

Posts.Content: Hi brave: thanks that's just what I'm doing in a week
Posts.Title: 4 years post brachytheraphy and cialis is hit or miss

Posts.Content: Hi newporter: I buy them from northwest pharmacy in BC, canada, and had good results. (Nw pharmacy has very good reviews). I have tried the free daily use 30 day trial Cialis taking 4 at a time and do not notice any difference on the name brand. bob
Posts.Title: 4 years post brachytheraphy and cialis is hit or miss

Posts.Content: I am 58; was diagnosed in Oct of 09 with PC; Gleason 3+3; 2 out of 12 cores found; Cancer 5% and 8% in those cores; PSA< 2.6; PC suspected due to hardness of right side of prostate during yearly exam. Surgeon recommended I get it out; lied and told me seeds were not being done much anymore. i researched it and located an oncologist that had done 1000+ seed implants; decided this was the best option. (My brother had his out 6 yrs ago and I believe is impotent.) I had my 3+ month checkup today (havent got PSA back yet), but my oncologist says I am doing very well (2-3 times a nite having to pee), and prostate is now flat. To all: please look at other options other than surgery!
Posts.Title: Serious Side Effects of Davinci Robotic Surgery

Posts.Title: Serious Side Effects of Davinci Robotic Surgery

Posts.Content: Hi to all: FYI I have been taking cymbalta for depression for 10 years. Never had ED issues that I could connect with it until lately. For the past year, I have had increasing ED issues that even Cialis was not able to conquer. (I had brachytherapy in 2010, and cialis used to work for me until the last 6 months or so.) Up until last month, I was not able to get hard even taking 3 cialis 20 mg over the course of 6-8 hours. I even went so far as to get a script for the penile injection meds at that time. The penile inject meds work fine (not as painful as I thought it would be) but still could not have an orgasm. So I decided to go off Cymbalta for a week, and it all came back! (hard ons in the morning, with little or no cialis, and was able to orgasm). So no more cymbalta for me! (or very rarely) bob
Posts.Title: ED and Cymbalta

Posts.Content: Hi: I had brachytherapy* 4 years ago. However, the cialis is working less and less. (I normally take 1 20 mg pill in the evening and then 1 more before bed. Sometimes I'm "UP" in the morning but never for long.) I usually have a few drinks with my girlfriend in the evening. In addition, I take Cymbalta for depression and a sleep aid to sleep since I cannot fall asleep on my own. I'm thinking about investigating injection drugs since I am not going to give up trying to F--K! Anyone else with similar issues? Any advice would be well appreciated. Thanks! bob PS: PSA has gone from 1.9 to less than .5 over the last 4 years, and I have my annual checkup in 2 weeks. (Had T2A, 2 out of 12 samples positive, 5% and 8%. Gleason was 3+3)
Posts.Title: Brachytherapy and cialis

Posts.Content: Hi To all: I was diagnosed with PC in Oct 2009, (Gleason 3+3, T2A, and PSA at about 2) due to my low score and that only 2 out of 12 samples positive, at 5% and 8%, I opted for the lesser of the 2 treatments, brachytherapy, which, thankfully has reduced PSA (that was never higher than 2.7) to .5 I take generic Cialis, 20 MG (Northwest Pharmacy, since insurance does not pay for ED treatment) the night before the morning I want to have sex. (Usually 2 pills). Sometimes it works, and sometimes not. http://www.cancerforums.net/images/icons/icon9.png (Cialis has always worked better than Viagra or Levitra) Any one else have this situation? Any advice as to how to improve things? (Don't drink at all before sex?, things to add to diet to help things along?, etc? Any feedback would be welcome! Thanks! bob
Posts.Title: How to reduce ED issues post brachytherapy 3+ years ago

Posts.Content: The Cialis I get from Northwest Pharmacy I believe is good. They are very highly rated. (I have tried a 30 day free sample from the drug company that makes Cialis, and it had marginal effects).
Posts.Title: How to reduce ED issues post brachytherapy 3+ years ago
